comments.body: [~gv] Please do not open jiras for mailing list questions. Here is how to subscribe to mailing lists https://storm.apache.org/getting-help.html . Once you subscribed to the mailing list you can just send an email to user@storm.apache.org. JIRAs are for bugs/features not for questions.
I am not understanding how to subscribe to mailing list i am getting an error and i am facing major issue with this bug so please it would be a great favor if anyone helps me.
@hima send a mail with subject "subscribe" to user-subscribe@storm.apache.org . After that you can send an email user@storm.apache.org.
